committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Intellectual Property, Competition and the Internet

official_title: Acknowledging the National Academy of Inventors (NAI) as a driving factor in the world economy and the contributions of scientist-inventors across all disciplines.

summary.text: Acknowledges the National Academy of Inventors (NAI) as a driving factor in the world economy and the contributions of scientist-inventors. Expresses support for university technological developments, promoting entrepreneurship and, support for university innovations in local communities. Recognizes the importance of inventions, patents, and copyrights as part of maintaining U.S. leadership in the world and a competitive global economy.

titles.title: Acknowledging the National Academy of Inventors (NAI) as a driving factor in the world economy and the contributions of scientist-inventors across all disciplines.
